thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 10 May 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Valener Reports Qtrly Adjusted Net Income Of $0.87 Per Share

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Valener Reports Qtrly Adjusted Net Income Of $0.87 Per Share
text:
May 10 (Reuters) - Valener Inc:
* VALENER AND ÉNERGIR, L.P. REPORT THEIR FISCAL 2018 SECOND QUARTER RESULTS
* VALENER INC - QTRLY ADJUSTED NET INCOME OF $0.87 PER SHARE
* VALENER INC - QTRLY NORMALIZED OPERATING CASH FLOWS PER SHARE OF $0.36
* VALENER - IMPACT OF U.S. TAX REFORM ON ÉNERGIR Q1 CONSISTED OF $238.0 MILLION DECREASE IN DEFERRED INCOME TAX LIABILITIES
* VALENER- TAX REFORM IMPACT ON ÉNERGIR Q1 CONSISTED CREATION OF $246.9 MILLION REGULATORY LIABILITIES, $24.2 MILLION FALL IN NET INCOME ATTRIBUTABLE TO PARTNERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
